entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is in a precarious situation.

entities.name: grass ceiling
entities.description: A location where Harry finds himself, with grass on the ceiling and sky on the ground.

entities.name: sky
entities.description: The environment that is normally above the ground, but has been reversed in this situation.

entities.name: ground
entities.description: The surface that Harry is trying to move towards.

relationships.description: Harry is on top of the grassy ceiling.
The sky and ground have been reversed in this situation.
Harry fell forward onto his knees onto the wonderfully solid ground.
